title: How can I trade in my Pixel 3a in India?
content:
I purchased my Google Pixel 3a in March 2020. 
I am pretty excited about the Pixel 4a, and would love to take help of the Google Trade-in program.
I needed help in knowing as to how this trade-in works in India, and if I will be able to trade in my 3a for a 4a once it gets launched.
